title: Character Modules - VR Hands
description: VR Hands enables accurate hand tracking and customisation.  Includes Physics items for finger object mapping.
longDescription:
VR Hands is part of a collection of packs from Blazar Games. These packs all contain useful features that can be used along or combined together - each pack is fully modular and fits each other seamlessly with no or very little code required to implement.


The VR Hands pack provides finger tracking support with VR motion controls along with Physics items, grab objects to see your fingers wrap around the object, toss the objects between players or juggle on your own, use the objects to apply damage when hitting other objects.


Each finger is handled individually allowing the developer to program in gestures easily or track each finger when the hardware (Such as the Knuckle controllers) are available. Currently they are mapped for the Oculus Rift Touch controllers but it is very easy to set up your own mappings - simply set the desired finger/s close value to 1.


This pack is multiplayer compatible.


Compatible with the Character Modules - Multiview IK + VR IK for full body skeleton control. See the Parenting information here: http://www.blazargames.com/downloads/ParentingOrder.pdf


Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j8QTXmcxVYg

Downloadable Demo: http://www.blazargames.com/downloads/CM_VRHands_Demo.zip



Other packs in the Character Modules collection include:


Character Modules - Multiview IK + VR IK: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/advanced-multiview-ik-character-with-vr-ik


Try Multiview IK pack and the VR_Hands packs combined demo here: http://www.blazargames.com/downloads/CM_MultiviewIK+VR_Hands_Demo.zip
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Easy to implement finger tracking
  •  Individual finger mapping
  •  Automatic object mapping
  • Physics items

Number of Blueprints: 1

Input: Oculus Touch, any other input method can be easily implemented.

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: PC

Supported Target Build Platforms: PC

Documentation: http://www.blazargames.com/downloads/ParentingOrder.pdf

Important/Additional Notes: Includes the Character Modules - Physics items
